items.sentence: The only thing Tom does all day is watch TV.

I've never thought about becoming a teacher.

Tom says he doesn't wash his hair every day.

I won't go swimming with Tom this afternoon.
I won't be able to keep Tom from doing that.
I don't think that Tom will ever forgive me.
Tom is sure that Mary can understand French.
Tom is the reason that Mary moved to Boston.
Tom is lucky somebody will help him do that.

Tom is worried his cat will never come back.
